```{r table, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)

# Generate kable object Themakanalen
params$data_tk |> kbl(
  format = "latex",
  booktabs = TRUE,
  longtable = TRUE,
  caption = "Program Statistics Theme Channels",
  align = c("l", "c", "r", "r"),
  label = "tk"
) |>
  kable_styling(
    latex_options = "repeat_header",
    font_size = 10,
    position = "center"
  )
# ```

# ```{r table, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

# Generate kable object Radio On Demand
params$data_rod |> kbl(
  format = "latex",
  booktabs = TRUE,
  longtable = TRUE,
  caption = "Program Statistics Radio On-demand",
  align = c("l", "c", "r", "r", "r"),

```


**Toelichting:**  

- **bc_hours** — Broadcast hours: aantal uitgezonden uren  
- **bc_date** — Broadcast date: datum van uitzending  
- **unique_ips** — Aantal IP-adressen: unieke luisteraars  
- **total_ips** — Aantal IP-adressen per dag: willekeurige luisteraars  
- **tot_hours** — Aantal luisteruren
